t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 1 week ago - Nike shoes are seen in the King ... impose import tariffs on dozens of countries, in King of Prussia, Pennsylvania, U.S., April 3, 2025. ... Nike will resume selling its products directly to Amazon in the U.S. for the first time since 2019, CNBC has confirmed. The sneaker giant stopped selling its goods wholesale on Amazon six years ago as part of a push to distribute more directly to customers and have greater control over the shopping experience.
